text: Teretiopsis is a genus of sea snails, marine gastropod mollusks in the family Raphitomidae. ==Species== Species within the genus Teretiopsis include: * Teretiopsis abyssalis Kantor & Sysoev, 1989 * Teretiopsis hyalina Sysoev & Bouchet, 2001 * Teretiopsis levicarinatus Kantor & Sysoev, 1989 * Teretiopsis nodicarinatus Kantor & Sysoev, 1989 * Teretiopsis thaumastopsis (Dautzenberg & Fischer H., 1896) ==References== ==External links== * Kantor, Yu I., and A. V. Sysoev. "The morphology of toxoglossan gastropods lacking a radula, with a description of new species and genus of Turridae." Journal of Molluscan Studies 55.4 (1989): 537-549 * * Worldwide Mollusc Species Data Base: Raphitomidae Category:Raphitomidae Category:Gastropod genera
title: Teretiopsis
